text: Samuel Daniel Shafiishuna "Sam" Nujoma (; 12 May 1929 â€“ 8 February 2025) was a Namibian politician. He was the first President of Namibia from 1990 to 2005."Nujoma succeeded by Pohamba", AFP (IOL), 30 November 2007. On 8 February 2025, Nujoma died at a hospital in Windhoek at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * Nujoma's interview to German magazine Die Welt (in German) * Nujoma: Where Others Wavered (2006) imdb Category:1929 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Presidents of Namibia
title: Sam Nujoma
